title: Both Teams from Match after huge lag spike
body: Well i just finished playing a match, well more like the game lagged out after a Shutting down a Khazix after which the player and his mid said they both lagged out the whole game started trying to reconnect. After which i get a bugsplat throwing me back to the client. Has anyone else run into this problem today ?

replies.body:
I haven't seen any games specifically crashing due to Kha'zix if that's what you're thinking may have happened. It sounds almost like that entire game glitched out and dropped everyone out of the match. If it keeps happening specifically with Kha'zix, please let us know again so that we can start looking into it!

Since you saw a bugsplat, it would also make sense that some game files freaked out during the match which caused you to get kicked out. Make sure to go through the steps in our [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) to cover the most common bugsplat causes.
